name: Plenty of fish in the sea! Can I find my true love after being teleported into an underwater world by a delivery truck?
name_original: Plenty of fish in the sea! Can I find my true love after being teleported into an underwater world by a delivery truck?
description:
This is a submission for
Game Off 2022 GameJam

Theme: Cliché

Our journey begin on Lake Well, where our main hero decides to confess to his crush. After being rejected by his crush, our hero are teleported magically into an underwater world by an out of control truck.

Now in a school for fish, utilizing your brand new fish body,
you must find yourself a date before prom comes around!

Will you find your true love?
Will you return to your former self?
Do you think free will actually exists?

Play the game and find out, I guess

Gaia : Sprites, UI, Programming, Writing

Ky : Music, SFX

Muhamadmentari : Backgrounds, Sprites, UI, Writing

Rin : Writing, Programming, Sprites

Storm : Programming, Writing
